thread.title: Here’s Margot Robbie Yelling ‘Suck My Dick’ At Someone Because That’s A Thing That Happened
thread.title_full: Here’s Margot Robbie Yelling ‘Suck My Dick’ At Someone Because That’s A Thing That Happened

author: Douglas Charles
title: Here’s Margot Robbie Yelling ‘Suck My Dick’ At Someone Because That’s A Thing That Happened
text:
Getty Image

I think about the only thing related to sports that could be more surreal than the legendary Tonya Harding-Nancy Kerrigan fiasco is seeing Margot Robbie acting it out for a movie as Harding herself.
Why do I say that? Because Margot Robbie dressed up like Tonya Harding in a figure skating outfit, yelling and telling someone to “suck my dick” is something that actually happened.
On Thursday we got our first good glimpse of Robbie’s figure skating skills for I, Tonya while dressed up as Harding, and the 26-year-old actress was pretty impressive.
However, she was nowhere near as impressive as today’s new footage which shows Robbie dropping F-bombs and telling someone to “suck my dick.”

(If that clip doesn’t work for some reason, you can also view it here , here and here .)
She pretty much nailed it, don’t you think?
And here are some more new pics of Robbie on set in her suh-weet Tonya Harding costume looking, well, horrible.





This movie is going to win SO many Oscars, don’t you think
